name: Victor Sanchez
content: Victor Sanchez - HOME Home Research Publications Teaching Students & visitors SIP Lab Prospective students Victor Sanchez, PhD Associate Professor Department of Computer Science University of Warwick Contact Room CS2.30 Computer Science University of Warwick Coventry, UK CV4 7AL Email: V.F.Sanchez-Silva [at] warwick.ac.uk Tel: +44 (0) 24 7657 3887 Research interests Signal and information processing, and machine/deep learning with applications to images, videos, and audio.
